WeaponTraitDef.label: Frozen Element
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon inflicts frozen damage, which frequently stuns targets.

WeaponTraitDef.label: Acid Element
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon inflicts corrosive damage that continues to deal damage over time and reduces blunt and sharp armor.

WeaponTraitDef.label: Acid Cloud Burst
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon creates acid damage clouds that explode upon contact.

WeaponTraitDef.label: Homing Projectile
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon's projectiles automatically track and home in on targets during flight.

WeaponTraitDef.label: Feargas
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon releases a cloud of fear gas, and inhaling the gas will lead to severe violent tendencies.

WeaponTraitDef.label: Lightning Element
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon inflicts electrical damage, causing electrocution burns that impair movement.

WeaponTraitDef.label: Chain Lightning
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon releases lightning that bounces between targets.

WeaponTraitDef.label: Slime Adhesion
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon causes explosive slime contamination, detonating a few seconds after contact with air.

WeaponTraitDef.label: Fire Element
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon inflicts fire damage and weakens thermal armor.

WeaponTraitDef.label: Split Attack
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon deals additional elemental damage to several nearby targets.

WeaponTraitDef.label: Combat Endurance
WeaponTraitDef.description: Each attack enhances the user, increasing attack speed and damage.

WeaponTraitDef.label: Frost Cloud Burst
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon creates frost damage clouds that explode upon contact.
